update_title: A new update for this app is available.
update_message: Update this app because this version has some issues.

items.title: Secret Guns
items.text:
1.Download the WW2 Pack(Larik_lol) mods from the description

2.Open ES File Explorer/Andro Zip/Zarchiver that you in the requirements.
items.text_2:
3. zip select ‘Extract to’.(mod file suffix is ​​.melmod).

4.To add the item or skin a .MELMOD file contains to the Android version of Melon Playground, place the file in the following folder:
